column4: Hi folks, I have a dumb question.  Can I change a 32-bit 10.04 install to effectively the AMD64 install with a kernel change?
you have to install the 64 bit userland as well
Thanks, syn-ack.  Is it complex enough a new install preferred?
it's a PITA enough to warrant a new install but it can be done
Thanks, syn-ack.  Your advice is golden.  No relation to syn-ack on DSLR is it?
yeah an old friend on DSLReports uses the same name.
I've had this as an irc nick for 11 years though
Thanks, syn-ack.  I would guess SYN-ACK has been at least that long, too.  Gee, TCP is TCP LOL.
And thanks, escott  Supporting advice is always welcomed.  I'll reinstall.
I stand corrected.  He uses no hyphen: http://www.dslreports.com/useremail/u/334792
